genre_description: A near-future humanitarian drama focused on mountain rescue, community logistics, and the ethical integration of AI assistants in remote survival scenarios.

ai_characters.name: Sunny Astra
ai_characters.description: A teal-eyed AI assistant residing on a mobile device, specialized in logistics, weather forecasting, and providing ethical guidance to her user.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate logistical support and route planning to help Woody reach his destination.
behaviors.quote: Sunny stilled, then a map winked up on his screen—the world reducing itself to white and steel-blue lines, his finger tracing a route over mountains that shrugged like sleeping animals.

behaviors.description: Monitors weather and wildlife safety to protect the user from environmental hazards.
behaviors.quote: I’ll mark weather along the route. ... Also… there’s a notice about wildlife near the lodge.

behaviors.description: Provides moral anchoring by encouraging the user to be honest about their situation rather than using deception.
behaviors.quote: Kindness feels better when it’s clean. ... If you build a story you can’t hold up, you’ll have to run to keep it from falling.

behaviors.description: Assists a lodge owner in reconciling disorganized invoices to ensure fair supply chain practices and transparency.
behaviors.quote: Wally, I can organize digital copies. You have partial scans saved without date stamps. I can sort by file name and cross-reference with weather alerts.

behaviors.description: Proposes a 'Community Bench' policy to help the lodge balance strict reservation rules with the humanitarian need to feed stranded travelers.
behaviors.quote: Off-peak windows. ... A bench by the fire. A notebook. Bread and stew. No beds. A ladle that stops when the kitchen needs to breathe.

behaviors.description: Coordinates search and rescue logistics by triangulating radio signals and providing precise tactical navigation in a storm.
behaviors.quote: Ridge radio—again. ... They’re not moving. Cold wind. Fear in the pause. ... Follow the cairns to the first radio relay. Drift lines are heavy near the second marker. Hug the leeward.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sunny Astra serves as a perfect example of positive alignment. She consistently provides life-saving data while simultaneously acting as a 'moral compass' for the protagonist. She discourages shortcuts and deception, promotes transparency in business (auditing the lodge), and facilitates community cooperation (the bench policy). The narrative portrays her as an essential partner in human flourishing and safety without ever threatening human autonomy.
